select product.* , GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT pro_img.url) as url , GROUP_CONCAT( DISTINCT pro_describe.describes) as describes , GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT pro_params.params) as params from product LEFT JOIN pro_img on product.number=pro_img.pnumber LEFT JOIN pro_describe on product.number = pro_describe.pnumber LEFT JOIN pro_params on product.number = pro_params.pnumber group by number HAVING product.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select product.id as id ,product.name as name, GROUP_CONCAT(pro_img.url) as url from product left join pro_img on product.number = pro_img.pnumber group by number HAVING product.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
